feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
